channel.title: CVE Feed for Essential Addons -- Essential Addons for Elementor Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Essential Addons -- Essential Addons for Elementor Pro

item.title: CVE-2024-3645|2024-04-22T13:51:46.929Z -- essential%20addons -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20pro
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor Pro plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Counter widget in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.11 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes such as 'title_html_tag'. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5612|2024-06-07T04:33:24.031Z -- essential%20addons -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20pro
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor Pro plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘eael_lightbox_open_btn_icon’ parameter within the Lightbox & Modal widget in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.15 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
